003892BF.desc:
Raise a Skeleton from a Corpse to fight for you.

Once all of your Skeletons have been summoned, Raise Skeleton briefly summons a {c_important}Skeletal Priest{/c} to empower your Minions for {c_number}{SF_2}{/c} seconds, increasing their damage by {c_number}[{SF_4} * 100|%|]{/c} and healing them for {c_number}[{SF_3} * 100|%|]{/c} of their Maximum Life.
